admins.!_Info: Admins must be set to be able to use the bot
admins.._Info: A single user can be added by entering the user ID into 'users', or an entire group can be added by entering in a guild role ID
admins.*_Info: Admins will be immune to any warnings.

channels.*_Info: Channels are highly recommended to be set. The ignore channels array will only ignore channels for automation, manual warnings will still work.

roles.!_Info: Roles are required if a rule has a letter 'R' at the start. (example: 'RmuteAfter')
roles.._Info: If a role is invalid or not specified, the rule will be ignored.
roles.*_Info: Roles must be the ID of a role. ID of roles can found like this: https://zachary.fun/i/XGrAK.png

rules.!_Info: Each number is the amount of warns until it performs the action.
rules.._Info: To disable/ignore a rule, set it to a warning level of 0.

automation.!_Info: Automation is settings to determine what to automatically warn users.
automation.._Info: Each setting must bet set to either 'true' or 'false'.
